snippet: The House of Representatives approved a bill that would ban abortions after 22 weeks of pregnancy in a largely symbolic vote.
abstract: House of Representatives approves bill to ban abortions after 22 weeks of pregnancy; largely symbolic vote is most restrictive ban on abortion considered by Congress in past decade, laying bare deep ideological differences between Democrats and Republicans.
lead_paragraph: The House of Representatives approved a bill that would ban abortions after 22 weeks of pregnancy in a largely symbolic vote.

headline.main: In Partisan Vote, House Approves Ban on Abortions After 22 Weeks
headline.print_headline: In Partisan Vote, House Approves Ban on Abortions After 22 Weeks
